devdoc.author: NFTfi
devdoc.details: This contract prevents owners of the bundles to remove any child, but they can still receive new children.      Solves the problem of bundles being emptied by their owner between they are listed and the loan begins.

constructor.details: Stores the bundler, name and symbol

params._immutableId: the id of the immutable bundle
params._personalBundler: the address of the personal bundler conract

params._immutableId: the id of the immutable bundle

params._to: The address that owns the new immutable bundle

returns._0: The id of the new created immutable bundle

params._bundleId: The bundle that is being transferred param _data Arbitrary data
params._from: The previous owner of the token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Triggers stopped state. Requirements: - Only the owner can call this method. - The contract must not be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params._data: - function selector to be called on the airdropping contract
params._immutableId: - the id of the immutable bundle
params._nftAirdrop: - address of the used claiming nft in the drop
params._nftAirdropId: - id of the used claiming nft in the drop
params._nftContract: - contract address of the target nft of the drop
params._nftId: - id of the target nft of the drop

requestTransferOwnership(address).details: Requests transferring ownership of the contract to a new account (`_newOwnerCandidate`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._tokenAddress: - address of the token contract for the token to be sent out
- address of the token contract for the token to be sent out
params._tokenId: - id token to be sent out

unpause().details: Returns to normal state. Requirements: - Only the owner can call this method. - The contract must be paused.

params._immutableId: the id of the immutable bundle
params._to: the address of the receiver of the bundle

params._immutableId: the id of the immutable bundle
params._to: the address of the receiver of the bundle

devdoc.title: ImmutableBundle

convertToPersonalBundler(uint256,address.notice: Takes an existing immutable regular bundle and converts it to a personal bundle, has to be provided with a personal bundler contract address

createAndConvertToPersonalBundler(uint25.notice: Takes an existing immutable regular bundle and converts it to a personal bundle, creates the personal bundler contract implicitly.

mintBundle(address).notice: Mints a new bundle storing it as immutable bundle.         The bundle can receive children but there is no way to remove a child, unless withdrawing the bundle.

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: Method invoked when a bundle is received param The address that caused the transfer

pullAirdrop(uint256,address,uint256,addr.notice: this function initiates a flashloan to pull an airdrop from a tartget contract

rescueERC20(address,address).notice: used by the owner account to be able to drain ERC20 tokens received as airdrops for the locked  collateral NFT-s

rescueERC721(address,uint256,address).notice: used by the owner account to be able to drain ERC721 tokens received as airdrops for the locked  collateral NFT-s

withdrawAndDecompose(uint256,address).notice: Withdraw a bundle and remove all the children from the bundle

userdoc.notice: Bundle wrapper that allows users to lock bundles so they can be used for loans.
